title: My Brother and I - use of the word "tyrannies"

content.question: In context, the use of the word "tyrannies" (Paragraph 2) conveys the author's

choices.label: sense of being dominated by others
view that the world is usually cruel
na√Øve acceptance of the rules of others

content.answer: sense of being dominated by others

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
